typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		customer_id as long,
		source_id as string,
		first_name as string,
		middle_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		dob as timestamp,
		gender as string,
		nationality as string,
		marital_status as string,
		occupation as string,
		avg_family_size as integer,
		income_level as string,
		date_onboarded as timestamp,
		created_date as timestamp,
		updated_date as timestamp,
		effective_start_date as timestamp,
		effective_end_date as timestamp,
		Identifier_type as string,
		identifier as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	dateFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss']) ~> Customers
source(output(
		product_id as integer,
		product_name as string,
		product_type as string,
		product_description as string,
		issue_date as date,
		valid_till_date as date,
		account_status as string,
		credit_card_limit as integer,
		interest_rate as double,
		tenure as integer,
		service_charges as string,
		customer_id as integer,
		fd_principal_amount as integer,
		loan_collateral_value as integer,
		loan_amount as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	dateFormats: ['yyyy/MM/dd']) ~> Products
Customers select(mapColumn(
		customer_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> customerIDs
Products, customerIDs assert(expectExists(Products@customer_id == customerIDs@customer_id, false, 'customerIDExists', null, toString(Products@customer_id) + ": is not a valid customer id"),
	expectTrue(valid_till_date >= issue_date, false, 'validAfterIssueDate'),
	expectTrue(account_status == "Open" || account_status == "Closed", false, 'accountStatusOpenClosed')) ~> Assert1
Assert1 derive(product_name = initCap(product_name),
		product_type = upper(product_type),
		product_description = upper(product_description),
		issue_date = toDate(toString(issue_date), "MMM-dd-yyyy"),
		valid_till_date = toDate(toString(valid_till_date), "MMM-dd-yyyy")) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 filter(isError()) ~> Filter1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string
	),
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ProductsClean
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['productsErrors.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> productsErrors
